about_the_game:
Help whisker president not get impeached and pass bills :3c

Complete the president's job as you act as secret service agent to stamp all of the right bills with Wr. President, the adorable cat in a suit.

Whisker President is a comedic, point-and-click simulation that draws in inspiration from Papers, Please and other political sims.

PURFORM LIKE A PURRFECT PRESIDENT

Experience a chaotic management environment as you wrangle your cat to stamp all of the right bills at the right time. You have a laser pointer, some ink and glue, and a ton of distractions to fend off.

GAIN THE ABILITY TO MULTITASK

Whisker President takes players on a fun adventure filled with campaigns, distractions, and lots of stamping. Mysteriously, the president became a cat in a suit and now you have to help the cat do what he needs to do without getting him caught and distracted from the job. Discover, experiment, and stamp as you survive through various days of the presidential campaign!

UPLIFTING, COMEDIC, AND BALANCED

Navigate the challenges of presidential life, from a dependent economy to scandalous distractions never seen before in the oval office.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Monterey 12+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon / Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630 / AMD Radeon Pro 555X
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Monterey 12+
  • Processor: Apple M2 Pro
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M2 Pro / AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Whisker President

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+ 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 315 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+ 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i9 / AMD Ryzen 9
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3080 / AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 210 MB available space

short_description: Whisker President is a comedic, casual point-and-click game set in a cartoon style oval office. Armed with only a laser pointer and some glue, help the purresident achieve political success by making him stamp the bills, all while ensuring that distractions don't get in the way.
